short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: makes the internet softer for you so you can have some nice web browsing before you sleep

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
makes the internet lowercase  from 9 pm to 6 am so you can have  a relaxing browsing experience  before you sleep 

you can also manually toggle sleepy time if you don’t have a bedtime or want to browse  the web before a nap
